actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the return of the remains of Pocahontas to the United States and the establishment of an appropriate memorial commemorating her place in American history.

summary.text: Authorizes the return of the remains of Pocahontas to the United States and the establishment of an appropriate memorial commemorating her place in American history. Authorizes appropriations of sums necessary to carry out the purposes of this resolution.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the return of the remains of Pocahontas to the United States and the establishment of an appropriate memorial commemorating her place in American history.
